job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Automating Salesforce and CPQ Configurations: Develop AI-driven solutions to streamline customizations and minimize manual tasks
     * CPQ Optimization: Configure and automate CPQ workflows to improve quoting accuracy and speed
     * CI/CD Pipeline Management: Implement and maintain automated deployment processes for Salesforce updates, * By leading the delivery of end-to-end business solutions, you will ensure all systems are aligned with performance, security, and scalability requirements
job_details.full_text:
Senior Salesforce Developer, Trilogy (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

* Automating Salesforce and CPQ Configurations: Develop AI-driven solutions to streamline customizations and minimize manual tasks
     * CPQ Optimization: Configure and automate CPQ workflows to improve quoting accuracy and speed
     * CI/CD Pipeline Management: Implement and maintain automated deployment processes for Salesforce updates, * By leading the delivery of end-to-end business solutions, you will ensure all systems are aligned with performance, security, and scalability requirements

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on Salesforce development and CPQ configuration, with a mention of 'AI-driven solutions' for automation. However, it lacks specific details about AI model development, training, or generative AI techniques. The core responsibilities and technologies mentioned (Salesforce, CPQ, CI/CD) are not directly related to the core definitions of ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer. Therefore, it falls under the 'Ambiguous' category as it's primarily a business-focused technical role not directly centered on AI/ML engineering.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'Salesforce Developer' and 'automating Salesforce and CPQ configurations', which involves building and maintaining software solutions within the Salesforce ecosystem.
The phrase 'Develop AI-driven solutions to streamline customizations and minimize manual tasks' indicates the development of software to automate processes.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop AI-driven solutions to streamline customizations and minimize manual tasks

job_tasks.justification: Configuring and automating workflows within CPQ is a software development task focused on business process automation.
job_tasks.phrase: Configure and automate CPQ workflows to improve quoting accuracy and speed

job_tasks.justification: Implementing and maintaining automated deployment processes for software updates falls under operations engineering.

Ensuring systems align with performance, security, and scalability requirements, and leading the delivery of end-to-end business solutions, requires understanding business needs and aligning technical delivery.
job_tasks.phrase: ensure all systems are aligned with performance, security, and scalability requirements

soft_skills.phrase: leading the delivery of end-to-end business solutions
